translated: Sutra on the Auspicious Signs of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Fascicle 2

original: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚
analyzed: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚
translated: Tripiṭaka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-hung-lu

original: 少卿傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯
analyzed: 少卿傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯
translated: Shao-qing, Dharma-transmitting Great Master, subject Shi Hu, respectfully translated by imperial decree
It is noted:

original: 「有支順轉，積日逆流，黑白月餘，如經廣說。
analyzed: 「有支順轉，積日逆流，黑白月餘，如經廣說。
translated: The forward progression of the links accumulates days, the reverse flow is the remainder of the dark and bright months, as explained in detail in the sutra.

original: 」爾時眾會，無量人天，白世尊言：
analyzed: 」爾時眾會，無量人天，白世尊言：
translated: At that time, the assembly of countless humans and gods said to the World-Honored One:

original: 「烏鳥鳴吟，時來不定，如何了知？
analyzed: 「烏鳥鳴吟，時來不定，如何了知？
translated: The cries of crows and birds are unpredictable. How can we understand them?
Please, Buddha, explain.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於十二支，審諦觀察，了知憂喜。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於十二支，審諦觀察，了知憂喜。
translated: If there are people who carefully observe the twelve links, they will understand joy and sorrow.

original: 若無明支日，烏鳴於右，妻女見喜；
analyzed: 若無明支日，烏鳴於右，妻女見喜；
translated: If it is the day of the link of ignorance, a crow caws on the right, it brings joy to see wife and children;
if it caws on the left, a traveler will surely come.

original: 「於行支日，右鳴安吉、左鳴獲財。
analyzed: 「於行支日，右鳴安吉、左鳴獲財。
translated: On the day of the link of formation, cawing on the right brings peace and good fortune, cawing on the left brings wealth.

original: 「於識支日，右鳴所望必得遂意；
analyzed: 「於識支日，右鳴所望必得遂意；
translated: On the day of the link of consciousness, cawing on the right means one's hopes will surely be fulfilled;
If it chirps on the left, what is hoped for will not be accomplished.

original: 「於名色支，右鳴得財、左鳴囹圄。🔽「於六入支，右鳴驚怖、左鳴諍訟。
analyzed: 「於名色支，右鳴得財、左鳴囹圄。 「於六入支，右鳴驚怖、左鳴諍訟。
translated: If it chirps on the right on the name-and-form link, it will gain wealth; if on the left, it will be imprisoned.🔽 If it chirps on the right on the six sense bases link, it will be frightened; if on the left, there will be a legal dispute.

original: 「於觸支日，右鳴驚怖、左鳴家人至。
analyzed: 「於觸支日，右鳴驚怖、左鳴家人至。
translated: If it chirps on the right on the contact link, it will be frightened; if on the left, a family member will arrive.
If it chirps on the right on the feeling link, it will be as one wishes;

original: 左鳴獲信，散失財物。🔽「於愛支日，右鳴安樂、左獲善信。🔽「於取支日，右鳴苦辛、左獲安吉。
analyzed: 左鳴獲信，散失財物。 「於愛支日，右鳴安樂、左獲善信。 「於取支日，右鳴苦辛、左獲安吉。
translated: if on the left, one will gain faith but lose property.🔽 If it chirps on the right on the craving link, there will be comfort; if on the left, one will gain good faith.🔽 If it chirps on the right on the grasping link, it will be bitter; if on the left, one will gain comfort and good fortune.

original: 「於有支日，右鳴人問、左鳴安吉。
analyzed: 「於有支日，右鳴人問、左鳴安吉。
translated: If it chirps on the right on the becoming link, someone will ask about it; if on the left, it will be comfortable and fortunate.

original: 「於生支日，右鳴所求和合遂意；
analyzed: 「於生支日，右鳴所求和合遂意；
translated: If it chirps on the right on the birth link, what is sought will be combined and as one wishes;
if on the left, one will gain faith but property will be scattered and lost.
If it chirps on the right on the old age and death link, there will be no trouble;
if on the left, there will be destruction and a little property.
At that time the World-Honored One said to the assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於無明支，烏鳴北方，必獲來信。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於無明支，烏鳴北方，必獲來信。
translated: If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of ignorance, one will definitely receive good news.

original: 「於行支日，烏鳴北方，有喜事獲。🔽「於識支日，鳴北安吉，諧和遂意。
analyzed: 「於行支日，烏鳴北方，有喜事獲。 「於識支日，鳴北安吉，諧和遂意。
translated: If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of karmic formations, there will be joyful events.🔽If it caws in the north on the day of the link of consciousness, it is auspicious, and one's wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 「於名色支，北方鳴時，聞悅意事。
analyzed: 「於名色支，北方鳴時，聞悅意事。
translated: If it caws in the north on the day of the link of name-and-form, one will hear pleasant news.

original: 「於六入支，烏鳴北方，獲路遠事，財寶去遙，必非和合。
analyzed: 「於六入支，烏鳴北方，獲路遠事，財寶去遙，必非和合。
translated: If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of the six sense bases, one will receive news of a long journey, and wealth and treasures are far away, definitely not coming together.

original: 「於觸支日，烏鳴北方，有諍訟起。
analyzed: 「於觸支日，烏鳴北方，有諍訟起。
translated: If a crow caws in the north on the day of the link of contact, disputes will arise.

original: 「受支日鳴，北方安吉。🔽「愛支北鳴，遠離繫縛。🔽「取支北鳴，卒事獲信。
analyzed: 「受支日鳴，北方安吉。 「愛支北鳴，遠離繫縛。 「取支北鳴，卒事獲信。
translated: If it caws in the north on the day of the link of feeling, it is auspicious.🔽If it caws in the north on the day of the link of craving, one will be freed from bondage.🔽If it caws in the north on the day of the link of grasping, one will suddenly receive good news.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of becoming, one will definitely obtain clothing and other items.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of birth, people will come to ask about matters.
If it caws in the north on the day of the link of old age and death, everything is auspicious.
At that time, the great assembly said to the World-Honored One:
How can one know if the upper palate is twitching?
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於十二支，憶念不忘，悉皆了達。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於十二支，憶念不忘，悉皆了達。
translated: If there is a person who remembers and does not forget the twelve links, and fully understands them,

original: 若無明支，齶上眴動，大聖者至。
analyzed: 若無明支，齶上眴動，大聖者至。
translated: if the link of ignorance causes the upper palate to twitch, a great sage will arrive.
If the link of karmic activity causes the sun to twitch, the head of the family will be at peace.
If the link of consciousness causes the upper palate to twitch, a sage will definitely come.
If the link of name-and-form causes the twitching, one will obtain much wealth.
If the link of the six sense bases causes the twitching, afflictions will arise in the mind.
If the link of contact causes the upper palate to twitch, it will be pleasing and delightful.
If the link of sensation causes the sun to twitch, there will be frightening events.
If the link of craving causes the sun to twitch, the family wealth will increase.

original: 「取支日眴，中一人夭。🔽「有支日眴，聖者來至。
analyzed: 「取支日眴，中一人夭。 「有支日眴，聖者來至。
translated: If the link of grasping causes the sun to twitch, someone in the middle will die.🔽If the link of becoming causes the sun to twitch, a sage will come.
If the link of birth causes the sun to twitch, thieves will definitely arrive.
If the link of old age and death causes the twitching, there will be harmony in the household.

original: 「若復有人，觀十二支，了知憂喜。
analyzed: 「若復有人，觀十二支，了知憂喜。
translated: If a person observes the twelve links and understands sorrow and joy,

original: 於無明支，心上眴動，諍訟煩惱。
analyzed: 於無明支，心上眴動，諍訟煩惱。
translated: in the link of ignorance, the mind trembles above, and there are afflictions of disputes.
The link of action trembles during the day, and one obtains wealth.
The link of consciousness trembles in the mind, and there are frightening events.
The link of name-and-form trembles in the mind, and parents are delighted.

original: 「六入支眴，於所求事，和合現前。
analyzed: 「六入支眴，於所求事，和合現前。
translated: The link of the six sense bases trembles, and the sought-after matter is combined and appears.
The link of contact trembles in the mind, and parents are frightened.

original: 「受支心眴，南行禳之，乃可宜吉。
analyzed: 「受支心眴，南行禳之，乃可宜吉。
translated: The link of feeling trembles in the mind, and one should avert it by going south, then it will be auspicious.
The link of craving trembles in the mind, and one obtains great sorrow.
The link of grasping trembles in the mind, and an evil person arrives.
The link of becoming trembles in the mind, and there is a matter of sorrow and sadness.
The link of birth trembles in the mind, and there is certainly great fear.

original: 「老死支日心上眴動，老者必卒。
analyzed: 「老死支日心上眴動，老者必卒。
translated: The link of old age and death trembles above the mind during the day, and the old one will certainly die.
At that time, the great assembly again said to the Buddha:

original: 「此十二支，有此祥瑞，於日用事，未能了知，復云何行，唯願宣說。
analyzed: 「此十二支，有此祥瑞，於日用事，未能了知，復云何行，唯願宣說。
translated: These twelve links have these auspicious signs, but I am still unable to understand their daily activities. How should I proceed? Please explain.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於無明支及行支日，聚會筵設、修飾田宅、問事見貴、洗頭等吉；
analyzed: 「若復有人，於無明支及行支日，聚會筵設、修飾田宅、問事見貴、洗頭等吉；
translated: If there are people, on the days of the links of ignorance and of formations, who gather for banquets, decorate their fields and houses, consult on matters and see the noble, wash their heads and so forth, it is auspicious;
but bathing and making clothes should not be used.

original: 「於行支日，求事聽法、習學弧矢、收伏冤賊、澡浴親貴、皆宜善用；
analyzed: 「於行支日，求事聽法、習學弧矢、收伏冤賊、澡浴親貴、皆宜善用；
translated: On the day of the link of formations, seeking matters, listening to the Dharma, learning archery, subduing enemies, bathing and associating with the noble are all suitable to be used well;

original: 洗頭有患，作衣退敗，慎勿用之。
analyzed: 洗頭有患，作衣退敗，慎勿用之。
translated: but washing the head has problems, and making clothes will lead to defeat, so do not use them.

original: 「於識支日，王受灌頂、伏冤收軍、修營聚落、州府舍宅、成就皆吉，洗髮咽項、造衣宜用；
analyzed: 「於識支日，王受灌頂、伏冤收軍、修營聚落、州府舍宅、成就皆吉，洗髮咽項、造衣宜用；
translated: On the day of the link of consciousness, the king receiving the consecration, subduing enemies, gathering the army, cultivating and building villages, state offices, and houses, all accomplishments are auspicious. Washing the hair, throat, and neck, and making clothes should be used;
but bathing will lead to fear, so be very careful.

original: 「若名色支，諸所作事、及常住事、剃除髮爪、財物收藏、皆善宜用；
analyzed: 「若名色支，諸所作事、及常住事、剃除髮爪、財物收藏、皆善宜用；
translated: If it is the day of the name-and-form link, all tasks that are done, as well as tasks that are done permanently, shaving the hair and nails, storing wealth and goods, are all suitable to be used;

original: 洗頭色變，澡浴驚怖，若作衣時，獲喜速破。
analyzed: 洗頭色變，澡浴驚怖，若作衣時，獲喜速破。
translated: washing the head causes the complexion to change, bathing causes alarm, if making clothes at that time, joy is obtained but quickly destroyed.

original: 「六入支日，王受灌頂、修治聚落、圓滿成就、他人勿拜、遷動新宅、財物遠離、收護獲罪；
analyzed: 「六入支日，王受灌頂、修治聚落、圓滿成就、他人勿拜、遷動新宅、財物遠離、收護獲罪；
translated: On the day of the six sense bases link, the king receives the consecration, repairs the village, achieves completion, others should not pay homage, moves to a new house, wealth and goods are far away, collecting protection obtains the crime;

original: 若澡浴時，父母驚怖，若洗頭時，名稱無怖。
analyzed: 若澡浴時，父母驚怖，若洗頭時，名稱無怖。
translated: if bathing at that time, parents are alarmed, if washing the head at that time, fame is fearless.

original: 「於觸支日，作善不成、惡事害人、罪犯速成。
analyzed: 「於觸支日，作善不成、惡事害人、罪犯速成。
translated: On the day of the contact link, doing good is not accomplished, evil events harm people, criminal offenses are quickly accomplished.

original: 於取支日，一切所為、父母驚怖、澡浴作衣、愛人非久，必有血光，作衣未浴，宜勿著之。
analyzed: 於取支日，一切所為、父母驚怖、澡浴作衣、愛人非久，必有血光，作衣未浴，宜勿著之。
translated: On the day of the grasping link, everything that is done, parents are alarmed, bathing and making clothes, loved ones are not for long, there must be blood light, making clothes but not bathing, it is not suitable to wear them.

original: 「於受支日，所求事喜、交易布施、修治精舍、吉慶宜用；
analyzed: 「於受支日，所求事喜、交易布施、修治精舍、吉慶宜用；
translated: On the day of the receiving link, the sought-after matters are joyful, trading and giving, repairing the monastery, and auspicious events should be used;

original: 洗頭驚怖，獲不遂意，若作衣時，所希非難，宜對友人著之前吉。
analyzed: 洗頭驚怖，獲不遂意，若作衣時，所希非難，宜對友人著之前吉。
translated: washing the head is frightening, obtaining what is not intended, if making clothes, what is hoped for is not difficult, it is auspicious to wear in front of friends.

original: 「於愛支日，資具珍寶、宜收護吉；
analyzed: 「於愛支日，資具珍寶、宜收護吉；
translated: On the day of the craving link, provisions and precious treasures should be collected and protected;

original: 輕微急速行用大憂，洗頭髮敗，作衣滿足。
analyzed: 輕微急速行用大憂，洗頭髮敗，作衣滿足。
translated: minor and urgent actions cause great worry, washing the hair fails, making clothes is fulfilled.

original: 「於取支日，小兒剃髮、所為輕事、皆宜用之；
analyzed: 「於取支日，小兒剃髮、所為輕事、皆宜用之；
translated: On the day of the grasping link, children's hair should be shaved, and minor matters should be used;

original: 師度弟子、剃除髭髮、服藥和合、送客嫁娶、吉慶富貴、澡浴獲財、作衣逢喜。
analyzed: 師度弟子、剃除髭髮、服藥和合、送客嫁娶、吉慶富貴、澡浴獲財、作衣逢喜。
translated: masters ordain disciples, shave beards and hair, take medicine, send guests, marry, auspicious and wealthy, bathing obtains wealth, making clothes encounters joy.

original: 「於有支日，結識交友、及一切事、諍訟遠離，洗頭勿用，作衣澡浴，皆宜吉慶。
analyzed: 「於有支日，結識交友、及一切事、諍訟遠離，洗頭勿用，作衣澡浴，皆宜吉慶。
translated: On the day of the becoming link, making acquaintances and friends, and all matters, disputes and arguments should be avoided, do not use washing the head, making clothes and bathing are all auspicious and joyful.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 「於生支日，修飾舍宅及鞍馬庫藏、見貴臣主、皆吉宜用；
analyzed: 「於生支日，修飾舍宅及鞍馬庫藏、見貴臣主、皆吉宜用；
translated: On the day of the birth link, decorating the house, carriages, horses, storehouses, seeing important ministers and lords are all auspicious and suitable to be used;

original: 澡浴遠行，亦宜用之，及洗頭喜，作衣非久，宜當日著。
analyzed: 澡浴遠行，亦宜用之，及洗頭喜，作衣非久，宜當日著。
translated: bathing and traveling far are also suitable to be used, as well as washing the head, being happy, making clothes that are not worn for a long time, and wearing them on the day.

original: 「老死支日，所起惡事、富者財散、作於利益及論義事、遠離諸非、洗頭速獲、飲食多美、澡浴心惱、作衣長久。
analyzed: 「老死支日，所起惡事、富者財散、作於利益及論義事、遠離諸非、洗頭速獲、飲食多美、澡浴心惱、作衣長久。
translated: On the day of the aging and death link, evil events that arise, the wealthy lose their wealth, doing beneficial things and discussing matters, staying away from all that is not right, washing the head quickly obtains, food and drink are mostly delicious, bathing the mind is troubled, making clothes lasts long.
Then the assembly said to the World-Honored One:

original: 「足眴地動，烏吟犬吠，油火鼠傷，善惡未了，願為演說。
analyzed: 「足眴地動，烏吟犬吠，油火鼠傷，善惡未了，願為演說。
translated: The twitching of the feet, the trembling of the earth, the cawing of crows, the barking of dogs, the injury of oil, fire, and rats, the good and evil are not yet clear, please explain it for us.
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於十二支，憶念審察，當知善惡。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於十二支，憶念審察，當知善惡。
translated: If there are people who contemplate and examine the twelve links, they should know the good and evil.
Why is it so?
On the day of the ignorance link, the twitching of the feet brings joy.

original: 「於行支日，足眴主事不吉勿用。
analyzed: 「於行支日，足眴主事不吉勿用。
translated: On the day of the link of existence, if the foot throbs, the head shakes, and the affairs of the master are inauspicious, do not use it.
On the day of the link of consciousness and name-and-form, there will be disputes.
On the day of the link of the six sense bases, if the foot throbs, a person will die.

original: 「觸、受、愛支，此三足眴，諍論事起。
analyzed: 「觸、受、愛支，此三足眴，諍論事起。
translated: On the day of the links of contact, feeling, and craving, if the foot throbs, disputes will arise.
On the day of the link of grasping, if the foot throbs, a person will die.

original: 「於有支日，足眴獲衣。🔽「生支足眴，賊難病怖。
analyzed: 「於有支日，足眴獲衣。 「生支足眴，賊難病怖。
translated: On the day of the link of becoming, if the foot throbs, one will obtain clothing.🔽 If the foot throbs on the day of the link of birth, there will be danger from thieves and illness.

original: 「老死支日，若足眴時，獲悲惱事。
analyzed: 「老死支日，若足眴時，獲悲惱事。
translated: On the day of the link of old age and death, if the foot throbs, one will experience sorrowful events.

original: 「復次，觀察十二有支，於無明支日，足眴動時，有劫盜至；
analyzed: 「復次，觀察十二有支，於無明支日，足眴動時，有劫盜至；
translated: Furthermore, observing the twelve links of dependent origination, on the day of the link of ignorance, if the foot throbs and moves, there will be robbery;
if the dog in the house barks, people will come to ask about distant matters;
if the clothes burn, there will be no problem;
if a rat gnaws at the clothes, danger will come;
if there is a crow cawing, family members will come to ask;
if the clothes are stained with oil, a person will suddenly receive news;
If the earth moves, the king's grace will be universally bestowed.

original: 「於行支日，足眴動時宜出行吉；
analyzed: 「於行支日，足眴動時宜出行吉；
translated: On the day of the action stage, if the foot trembles, it is auspicious to go out;
if a dog barks, there will be minor royal affairs;
if a crow cries, good news will surely arrive;
and if one sees blood or fire on one's clothes, one will experience joy;
if a rat bites one's clothes, one will attain great wealth and nobility;
if one's clothes are stained with oil, one will obtain many possessions;

original: 若地動時，飢饉劫殺，外國來侵。
analyzed: 若地動時，飢饉劫殺，外國來侵。
translated: if the earth moves, there will be a famine, killing, and invasion by foreign countries.

original: 「於識支日，足眴動時，有非人至；
analyzed: 「於識支日，足眴動時，有非人至；
translated: On the day of the consciousness stage, if the foot trembles, a non-human will arrive;

original: 有犬吠時，有賊盜至，及獲財物；
analyzed: 有犬吠時，有賊盜至，及獲財物；
translated: if a dog barks, thieves will arrive and one will obtain possessions;
if a crow cries, a dispute will arise;
if one's clothes burn, one will gain something;
if a rat bites one's clothes, one will lose and regain wealth;
if one's clothes are stained with oil, one's parents will be frightened;
if the earth moves, two kings will swallow each other.

original: 「名色支日，足眴獲財，不求自至；🔽犬吠人卒；
analyzed: 「名色支日，足眴獲財，不求自至； 犬吠人卒；
translated: On the day of the name-and-form link, if the foot throbs, one obtains wealth without seeking it;🔽If a dog barks, a person suddenly arrives;
If a crow cries, a loved one comes;
If clothes are gnawed by rats, lost wealth returns;
If clothes burn, there is joy;
If clothes are soiled with oil, an important person thinks of one;

original: 有地動時，有冤賊起，除剪國靜。
analyzed: 有地動時，有冤賊起，除剪國靜。
translated: When there is an earthquake, enemies arise, but the country becomes peaceful after they are eliminated.

original: 「六入支日，若足眴時，友人遠至，家長安吉；
analyzed: 「六入支日，若足眴時，友人遠至，家長安吉；
translated: On the day of the six sense bases link, if the foot throbs, a friend comes from afar and the family is safe and secure;
If a dog barks, there is a dispute;
If a crow cries, a person comes to reconcile;

original: 鼠傷衣服，有人水沒而卒；
analyzed: 鼠傷衣服，有人水沒而卒；
translated: If clothes are gnawed by rats, someone drowns and dies;
If clothes are burned, one obtains wealth through a dispute;
If clothes are soiled with oil, there is a frightening event;
When there is an earthquake, an elder dies.

original: 「於觸支日，若足眴時，喜事得聞；
analyzed: 「於觸支日，若足眴時，喜事得聞；
translated: On the day of the contact link, if the foot throbs, one hears good news;
If the dog at home barks, thieves come;
If a crow cries, there is fear;
When clothes are damaged by rats, one obtains wealth;
When clothes are burned by fire, it indicates sudden events with people;
When clothes are soiled by oil, one obtains joy from relatives;
There will be disputes due to earthquakes.

original: 「於受支日，足眴動時，出行宜吉；
analyzed: 「於受支日，足眴動時，出行宜吉；
translated: On the day of the receiving link, when the feet twitch, going out is auspicious;
When the dog at home barks, a holy one will arrive;
When clothes are damaged by rats, one will surely see the master;
When clothes are burned by fire, there will be minor matters arising;
When clothes are soiled by oil, one obtains what is disagreeable;
When there is an earthquake, distant news will surely arrive.
On the day of the craving link, when the feet twitch, one obtains wealth;
When the dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will surely be anger and disputes;
If a crow sings, one hears news from one's child;
When clothes are damaged by rats, someone will surely die suddenly;
When clothes are burned by fire, one obtains wealth;
When clothes are soiled by oil, there is good news;

original: 有地動時，冤賊必起，及有使命，從東而來。
analyzed: 有地動時，冤賊必起，及有使命，從東而來。
translated: When there is an earthquake, enemies will surely rise, and there will be a mission coming from the east.

original: 「於取支日，足眴獲罪，人卒有信；
analyzed: 「於取支日，足眴獲罪，人卒有信；
translated: On the day of the grasping link, if the foot trembles, one will incur guilt, and people will suddenly have faith;

original: 犬非時吠，有諍訟事；🔽烏鳴吟時，有眷屬卒；
analyzed: 犬非時吠，有諍訟事； 烏鳴吟時，有眷屬卒；
translated: If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will be disputes;🔽If a crow cries, there will be sudden trouble with relatives;
If a rat damages clothes, famine will come;
If clothes are damaged by fire, one will surely obtain something;
If clothes are stained by oil, one will lose property;
If there is an earthquake, an external enemy will invade.

original: 「於有支日，足眴動時，賊來聞信；
analyzed: 「於有支日，足眴動時，賊來聞信；
translated: On the day of the becoming link, if the foot trembles, thieves will come and one will hear news;

original: 犬吠非時，土地不寧；🔽若烏鳴吟，必獲於財；
analyzed: 犬吠非時，土地不寧； 若烏鳴吟，必獲於財；
translated: If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, the land will be unstable;🔽If a crow cries, one will surely obtain wealth;
If clothes are damaged by a rat, a family thief will surely come;
If clothes are damaged by fire, one will obtain delicious food and drink;
If clothes are stained by oil, there will be joy, and the earth will be abundant and ripe.

original: 「於生支日，足眴動時，遠乘速至；🔽犬非時吠，有喜悅事；
analyzed: 「於生支日，足眴動時，遠乘速至； 犬非時吠，有喜悅事；
translated: On the day of the birth link, if the foot trembles, a long journey will arrive quickly;🔽If a dog barks at an inappropriate time, there will be joyful events;
If a crow cries, there will be peace without incident;
If rats damage clothes, one will obtain much wealth;
If clothes are burned by fire, household goods will increase;
If clothes are stained with oil, there will be joy;
If there is an earthquake, there will be an army coming.

original: 「老死支日，足眴動時，諍論事虛；
analyzed: 「老死支日，足眴動時，諍論事虛；
translated: On the day of the branch of old age and death, if the foot trembles, disputes are empty;
If a dog barks at the wrong time, a friend will come from afar;
If a crow cries, there will be a dispute;

original: 衣鼠損時，財物散失；🔽火傷衣時，有囹圄難；
analyzed: 衣鼠損時，財物散失； 火傷衣時，有囹圄難；
translated: If clothes are damaged by rats, wealth will be lost;🔽If clothes are burned by fire, there will be prison difficulties;
If clothes are stained with oil, there will be a dispute;
If there is an earthquake, difficulties will come from the east.
At that time, the World-Honored One further told the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於此緣生十二有支，思念不忘，必能了遠憂喜等事。🔽若無明支日，宜護財物。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於此緣生十二有支，思念不忘，必能了遠憂喜等事。 若無明支日，宜護財物。
translated: If there are people who contemplate and do not forget the twelve links of dependent origination, they will certainly be able to understand faraway worries, joys, and other matters.🔽On the day of the link of ignorance, one should protect one's wealth.
On the day of the link of karmic formations, one should collect and give away wealth.
On the day of the consciousness link, it is suitable to learn skills.

original: 「名色支日，為眷屬吉。🔽「六入支日，結識事吉。
analyzed: 「名色支日，為眷屬吉。 「六入支日，結識事吉。
translated: On the day of the name-and-form link, it is auspicious for relatives.🔽 On the day of the six sense bases link, it is auspicious to conclude affairs.
On the day of the contact link, it is suitable to deal with enemies.
On the day of the feeling link, it is suitable for marriage.

original: 「於愛支日，奉王命事行禁非法。
analyzed: 「於愛支日，奉王命事行禁非法。
translated: On the day of the craving link, it is suitable to carry out the king's orders and prohibit wrongdoing.
On the day of the grasping link, it is suitable to know important matters.

original: 「老死支日，起非法業，正行勿用。
analyzed: 「老死支日，起非法業，正行勿用。
translated: On the day of the birth, old age, and death link, it is suitable to engage in unlawful activities, but not proper conduct.
At that time, the great assembly said to the World-Honored One:

original: 「此十二支，於卜問時，云何行之？
analyzed: 「此十二支，於卜問時，云何行之？
translated: When divining these twelve links, how should one proceed?
At that time, the World-Honored One said to the assembly:

original: 「若復有人，於無明支日，欲求卜問，獲於財物、鞍馬皆吉、眷屬聚會、不永勿用。
analyzed: 「若復有人，於無明支日，欲求卜問，獲於財物、鞍馬皆吉、眷屬聚會、不永勿用。
translated: If someone wishes to seek divination on the day of the ignorance link, they will obtain wealth, saddles, and horses, all auspicious. It is suitable for relatives to gather, but not for permanent matters.

original: 「於行支日，宜卜問事，出行食飲、思子念友、說法皆吉。
analyzed: 「於行支日，宜卜問事，出行食飲、思子念友、說法皆吉。
translated: On the day of the link of existence, if one consults for a matter, going out, eating and drinking, thinking of a child, remembering a friend, speaking the Dharma are all auspicious.

original: 「於識支日，若卜問時，事勿動喜、結識知友、不起煩惱、事說成就、災難息除。
analyzed: 「於識支日，若卜問時，事勿動喜、結識知友、不起煩惱、事說成就、災難息除。
translated: On the day of the link of consciousness, if one consults for a matter, the matter should not be moved or delighted, form a connection with a friend who knows consciousness, do not give rise to afflictions, the matter will be accomplished, and calamities and difficulties will be removed.

original: 「名色支日，若卜問時，有怖煩惱、事散遍普、骨肉離別。
analyzed: 「名色支日，若卜問時，有怖煩惱、事散遍普、骨肉離別。
translated: On the day of the link of name-and-form, if one consults for a matter, there will be fear and afflictions, the matter will be scattered everywhere, and there will be separation from bones and flesh.

original: 「六入支日，行卜問時，獲財禮事、及妻室悅、女男分貴。
analyzed: 「六入支日，行卜問時，獲財禮事、及妻室悅、女男分貴。
translated: On the day of the link of the six sense bases, if one consults for a matter, one will obtain wealth, honor, and the delight of one's wife and family, and sons and daughters will be honored.

original: 「於觸支日，卜問有諍，賊怖憂惱、非理患難、眷屬不和。
analyzed: 「於觸支日，卜問有諍，賊怖憂惱、非理患難、眷屬不和。
translated: On the day of the link of contact, if one consults for a matter, there will be disputes, fear of thieves, worries, unreasonable difficulties, and disharmony among relatives.

original: 「於受支日，求卜問事，多獲財寶、飲食衣物、妻室悅意、莊嚴具足。
analyzed: 「於受支日，求卜問事，多獲財寶、飲食衣物、妻室悅意、莊嚴具足。
translated: On the day of the link of feeling, if one consults for a matter, one will obtain much wealth, food, drink, clothing, and the delight of one's wife and family, and will be fully adorned.

original: 「於愛支日，求卜問事，心思搆畫、虛妄所求、皆非成就。
analyzed: 「於愛支日，求卜問事，心思搆畫、虛妄所求、皆非成就。
translated: On the day of the craving link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, mental thoughts and scheming, false requests, and all are not accomplished.

original: 「於取支日，求卜問事，見者歡喜、稱讚護持、座兼所乘、財獲多喜。
analyzed: 「於取支日，求卜問事，見者歡喜、稱讚護持、座兼所乘、財獲多喜。
translated: On the day of the grasping link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, those who see are delighted, praise and protect, the seat and vehicle, wealth gains much joy.

original: 「於有支日，求卜問事，獲怖王法、破壞憂惱、骨肉離散。
analyzed: 「於有支日，求卜問事，獲怖王法、破壞憂惱、骨肉離散。
translated: On the day of the becoming link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, one obtains fear of royal law, destruction and worry, bones and flesh scattered.

original: 「於生支日，求卜問事，獲大財物、一切諧和、圓滿成就、朋友歡喜、珍重稱讚。
analyzed: 「於生支日，求卜問事，獲大財物、一切諧和、圓滿成就、朋友歡喜、珍重稱讚。
translated: On the day of the birth link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, one obtains great wealth, all in harmony, perfectly accomplished, friends are delighted, cherished and praised.

original: 「於老死支，求卜問事，虛妄善惡、破壞星散、無有精華、事虛大憂、貪瞋數起。
analyzed: 「於老死支，求卜問事，虛妄善惡、破壞星散、無有精華、事虛大憂、貪瞋數起。
translated: On the day of the aging and death link, if one seeks divination and asks about matters, false good and evil, destroyed and scattered, without essence, matters are empty and greatly worried, greed and anger arise frequently.

original: 」爾時世尊，說是法已，告諸大眾：
analyzed: 」爾時世尊，說是法已，告諸大眾：
translated: At that time, after the World-Honored One had spoken this Dharma, he told the great assembly:

original: 「若復有人，審諦觀察十二緣生，了達善惡憂喜得失，應畫轉輪圖寫分明；
analyzed: 「若復有人，審諦觀察十二緣生，了達善惡憂喜得失，應畫轉輪圖寫分明；
translated: If there are people who carefully contemplate the twelve links of dependent origination, understand good and evil, joy and sorrow, gain and loss, they should draw a turning wheel and write it clearly;

original: 謂從無明，乃至老死，月日分位，次第羅列，鼠牛虎兔龍蛇馬羊猴雞犬豕，十二相狀，本形輪轉，次第為人解說。
analyzed: 謂從無明，乃至老死，月日分位，次第羅列，鼠牛虎兔龍蛇馬羊猴雞犬豕，十二相狀，本形輪轉，次第為人解說。
translated: That is, from ignorance up to old age and death, the positions of the months and days, arranged in sequence, rats, oxen, tigers, rabbits, dragons, snakes, horses, sheep, monkeys, chickens, dogs, and pigs, the twelve appearances, the original form turning, explained in sequence to people.

original: 」時諸大眾，聞佛所說，踊躍歡喜，信受奉行。
analyzed: 」時諸大眾，聞佛所說，踊躍歡喜，信受奉行。
translated: At that time, the great assembly, hearing the Buddha's teachings, rejoiced and delighted, and faithfully accepted and practiced them.
The Sutra on Auspicious Omens of the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination, Fascicle 2
